help.title: Help
instructions: You can add "and" "or" "nor" to improve them.
For example: you can search for *("Wins WorldCup" OR "Wins Champions Leauge") AND (football OR soccer) -American -beach -women's*
The results would show who won the Champions Leauge and the WorldCup lately.

signup.title: Signup
signup.confirmation_msg: A conformation email has been sent to you. Pleaes confirm your registration to activate your account!

date_range.title: Date Range
date_range.instructions: (Please include two four-digit years, such as 2008 and 2009, or leave them blank to include publications from any year)
